intro: Prior to my time at Facebook, I cofounded Lawn Chair, a product design and software development studio, and worked as a freelance designer and web developer. Outside of the world of design, I have experience in web development and maintain several open source libraries.
I'm interested in working with passionate teams to build products with thoughtful user experience considerations, exceptional visual design, and a high degree of craftsmanship.
I expect to graduate in May 2018 as a Bachelor of Design with University Honors, a minor in Art History, and a minor in Human-Computer Interaction.
